channel.title: About on Grad Student Writing Group at the University of Delaware
channel.description: Recent content in About on Grad Student Writing Group at the University of Delaware

item.title: About
item.description: Mission The mission of Grad Student Writing Group is to provide accountability for writing to survive, thrive, and publish in academia. Meaning of “Writing” “Writing” means any activity that happens between the conception of an idea and the publication. (Definition adopted from http://www.facultydiversity.org/) What we do Writing Goals Check-up: We report progress of previous writing goals, reflect, and set new goals for the next week. Write-on-Site: We sit together in one room and write on their respective projects.
